input.sentences: on our day of the protest | many people showed up .
it was great to see people fight even with enforcement there .
many people made signs in the protest .
it was great to see all of the creativity from the protesters .
we we marched out but we did not go out in silence .
output.sentences: The people took the day off of work in order to protest.
They wanted to fight for the rights to enforce stricter security control.
They displayed signs conveying their message in local buildings.
There were many protesters peacefully trying to get their message out in creative ways.
The protesters marched in silence to get their point across without violence and harsh words.
